# Commit and Push OctoFit Tracker Project Updates

1. Analyze all changes made to the entire project in the branch, including:
   - Django backend (models, serializers, views, admin, urls, tests, settings, management commands, requirements)
   - React frontend (App.js, components, CSS, package.json, public files)
   - Database and data files
   - Configuration and documentation files
2. Write a clear, descriptive commit message summarizing all new features and improvements, such as:
   - REST API endpoints for users, teams, activities, leaderboard, workouts
   - MongoDB/Djongo integration with Djongo ORM
   - Django REST Framework with CORS support
   - Admin registration for all models
   - Unit tests for backend
   - React frontend with Bootstrap styling and routing
   - React components for Activities, Leaderboard, Teams, Users, Workouts
   - API integration with Codespace environment support
   - Responsive navigation and styled UI
3. Stage all relevant project files, commit with the comprehensive message, and push to the current branch.
